channel.title: Hostgator is a scam?
channel.description:
So i decided to use hostgator, so i bought it, i logged into my cpanel, but 5 minutes later, my account got locked! So they tell me to open up a ticket, and i cant login to see my ticket either! So what, i just lost my money?
Its kind of retarded... i cant even login anymore..

item.title: Hostgator is a scam?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Epic Steve:

Did by anychance it say, “Login Attempt Failed!”. 'Cause I also just brought a domain from them, and around 5 mins later I can’t login. I have to send them an email with a photocopy of my debit card and passport, -.-…

Just call them, they ask for your first and last name, domain name, and your acc is activated within 20 minutes

Read full topic

The little guy gets overshadowed by the giants

item.title: Hostgator is a scam?

item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:11, topic:386928”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=482696.msg3536093#msg3536093 date=1300572376]
K, i basically got scammed:
Called BOTH their numbers, no response.
Live chat keeps saying the same thing over and over again…
[/quote]
LOL hostGator XD… yeah they are scammers. cancle your card[/quote]
!!!
spdfjodspfgjadfspgojdfpgj

Lol but i got it all fixed up, and everything is running smooth nao

Read full topic

item.title: Hostgator is a scam?
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

I used host gator for quite a long time as I had a connection in the company that gave me a good discount, The company was great while it was young but now that they are huge they really don’t give a shit about the small accounts and its apparent in the response time with tickets anymore. However they also don’t need to scam the small accounts either so I am sure you are just being impatient.

I still use it, and tbh i never really have problems with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Hostgator is a scam?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:7, topic:386928”]Well i probably was being impatient, and i didnt know they had a verification system, that would have explained itself and made things a bunch easier :o

Thanks anyways guys![/quote]
Just bought a domain with them (have been needing to anyways) along with hosting, and so far (10 minutes or so) nothing has gone wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Hostgator is a scam?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Well i probably was being impatient, and i didnt know they had a verification system, that would have explained itself and made things a bunch easier :o

Thanks anyways guys!

item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

I use hostgator. They are legit and prolly have a reason for doing this. I will pissed when my paypal account got limited but then I found out it was because someone hacked it and tried to add stolen credit cards and buy stuff.
